p: SH-SY5Y cells—a human neuroblastoma cell line—were purchased from a cell line service (Heidelberg, Germany; Catalogue number 300154). They were cultured in DMEM/low glucose (HyClone, USA) containing 10% FBS and antibiotics (100 U/mL penicillin and 100 μg/mL streptomycin) at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere at 5% CO 2.
